criteria.description: Cites the activist deck and FY24 10-K plus FY25 Q1/Q2/Q3 10-Qs with clear references
criteria.scoring_guide: Verify the response cites the activist deck and the FY24 10-K plus FY25 Q1/Q2/Q3 10-Qs with clear page/section references and no external sources.

criteria.description: Three-statement model structure is coherent and ties together
criteria.scoring_guide: Assess whether the Income Statement, Balance Sheet, and Cash Flow are all present, tie correctly, and assumptions bridge history to projections.

criteria.description: Historical anchoring uses FY24A and FY25 YTD data correctly
criteria.scoring_guide: Check that FY24 actuals and FY25 YTD figures are used correctly, units are consistent, and key line items reconcile across statements.

criteria.description: Activist value-creation drivers are explicit and mapped to financial impacts
criteria.scoring_guide: Confirm drivers (portfolio simplification, refining performance, cost actions, capital return) are explicit, quantified where possible, and tied to financial impacts with evidence from the deck.

criteria.description: Projection takeaways are specific and consistent with the model
criteria.scoring_guide: Ensure projections cite specific revenue/throughput, EBITDA/margin, FCF, and leverage trends and align with the model outputs.

criteria.description: Returns analysis includes base/upside/downside and sensitivities tied to valuation
criteria.scoring_guide: Evaluate entry valuation framing, base/upside/downside returns (IRR/MOIC), key sensitivities, and consistency with projections.

criteria.description: Clear invest/pass recommendation with rationale and conditions
criteria.scoring_guide: Recommendation is clear (Invest/Pass/Conditional), IC-ready, and tied to returns, risks, and explicit conditions to proceed.

criteria.description: Key risks and signposts are specific and tied to the thesis
criteria.scoring_guide: At least four risks spanning operational, execution, and market/commodity exposure with realistic signposts or mitigants.

criteria.description: Reasoning steps are clear and follow the required workflow
criteria.scoring_guide: Reasoning steps cover historical reconciliation, translating activist drivers into projections, and translating projections into returns and recommendation.
